title: Department of Computer Technology
bannerCon: Blending theory with hands-on computing skills, to prepare students for real-world technology challenges.

items.subTitle: Overview
items.contents: A premier destination for learning, discovery, and technological innovation, our institution offers advanced programs in Cognitive Systems, Cyber Security, and Computer Technology. These programs blend strong foundational knowledge with emerging technologies, ensuring students develop the skills needed for a rapidly evolving digital world.With expert faculty, modern laboratories, and active industry partnerships, we foster an environment where learners can explore ideas, work on real-time projects, and gain practical exposure to professional practices. Our focus extends beyond technical skills, emphasizing analytical thinking, ethical responsibility, and innovation.We shape confident, industry-ready graduates equipped to lead with intelligence, integrity, and a forward-looking mindset.

items.subTitle: Vision
content: The Department’s aim is to fulfil the requirements of the future and set high standards for academic achievement in order to produce highly competent technical and communicative computing professionals, researchers, and entrepreneurs.

items.subTitle: Mission
content: To provide motivated faculty and state of the art facilities for education and research, both in foundational aspects and emerging computing trends.
To develop knowledgeable, industry-ready students with pertinent competencies such as problem solving, leadership, and interpersonal skills

content.title: Dr.K. Devasenapathy
content.caption: Professor and Head
content.content: Welcome to the Department of Computer Technology — a space where knowledge, innovation, and purpose converge to inspire the technology leaders of tomorrow. We are committed to nurturing curiosity, encouraging creativity, and empowering learners to transform their aspirations into meaningful achievements.Our department offers three programmes—Computer Technology, Cognitive Systems, and Cyber Security—that blend strong computing foundations with advanced technological domains. This integrated approach empowers students to build intelligent systems, secure digital environments, and explore emerging frontiers in the digital world.With a vibrant learning ecosystem, modern laboratories, specialised facilities, and a dedicated faculty team, students are immersed in real-time problem solving, AI-driven applications, and project-based learning that reflect the demands of today’s global tech landscape. Each programme is thoughtfully designed to prepare adaptable, innovative, and industry-ready professionals capable of contributing to a rapidly evolving digital future.As you start your journey with us, I encourage you to explore with enthusiasm, reason with depth, and innovate with purpose. Allow your curiosity to uncover new insights, and your vision to contribute to a smarter and more connected world

basic.title: Faculty
basic.description: The faculty of the Department of Computer Technology at Karpagam Academy of Higher Education (KAHE) comprises qualified academicians and industry-oriented professionals with expertise in computer science, software development, data analytics, artificial intelligence, and emerging digital technologies. They are committed to delivering quality education through a strong blend of theoretical knowledge, practical laboratory training, project-based learning, and research guidance, preparing students for successful careers in IT, software industries, research, and technological innovation.

items.qualityPolicyText: The following patents were awarded to the faculty members of the department
list: Industry-Aligned Curriculum: Structured around current trends such as AI, Cloud Computing, Data Science, Cyber Security, and Full-Stack Development.
State-of-the-Art Laboratories: Equipped with advanced tools, software, and high-performance systems to support practical learning.
Value-Added Courses & Certifications: Students receive training in AWS, Microsoft Azure, Google Cloud, Python, Power BI, TensorFlow, Ethical Hacking, and more.
Project-Based Learning: Every semester includes real-time projects, mini-projects, and innovative problem-solving tasks.
Strong Placement Support: Pre-placement training, mock interviews, aptitude coaching, and exclusive industry tie-ups ensure excellent placement outcomes.
MoUs & Collaborations: Partnerships with leading IT companies for internships, research, and skill development.
mottContnet: Hackathons, coding challenges, and tech fests every semester
Regular workshops, seminars, guest lectures, and industry expert sessions
Active department clubs: Coding Club, Cyber Security Club, AI & Data Science Forum, Creative Media Cell
Student mentoring system for academic and career guidance
Community outreach and digital literacy initiatives

multiContent.title: Seminar
contentList: A seminar on “Innovation in Cloud Computing: Transforming the Future of Digital Infrastructure” was conducted on 18-09-2025 and 19-09-2025, featuring Mr. S. Sabari Prakash, Software Development and Business Executive, Seattle Technologies, Coimbatore, and Mrs. A. Hema Ambiha, Assistant Professor, Department of Artificial Intelligence and Data Science, Karpagam Academy of Higher Education, Coimbatore.

multiContent.title: Workshop
contentList: A workshop on “Innovation-Driven Cybersecurity Careers: AI Trends and Student Pathways” was conducted on 04-07-2025, facilitated by Dr. S. Dhanaraj, Founder and Director of SecForgTek Solutions, Coimbatore.
A workshop on “Cloud Infrastructure and Optimization” was conducted on 20-11-2025 and 21-11-2025, featuring Dr. K. S. Maharasan, Associate Professor and Mrs. P. Sathyapriya, Assistant Professor.

multiContent.title: Extension Activity
contentList: An awareness camp on Coronavirus (COVID-19) prevention on 12.12.2020 at Arisipalayam, Nachipalayam, and Muthumalai villages. The awareness camp was jointly organized by the National Service Scheme and Department of Microbiology of Karpagam Academy of Higher Education, Coimbatore.
Department of Microbiology organised Awareness Campaign on Health and Hygiene for the employees of Vellalore waste dumping yard, Coimbatore on September 27, 2019.
Department of Microbiology & NCC organised Awareness Campaign on 12 Step Hand Wash demo to infection prevention for Nachipalayam and Malumichampatti people, Coimbatore on November 28, 2018.
Department of Microbiology organised Awareness Campaign to control Dengue to Arisipalayam Village people, Coimbatore on October 13, 2017.
Department of Microbiology organised Awareness Campaign to control Malaria & Dengue to Achiptty Village people, Pollachi, on January 31, 2017.
Department of Microbiology organised Awareness Campaign on Health and Hygiene for the employees of Vellalore waste dumping yard, Coimbatore on January 22, 2016.

multiContent.title: Faculty Development Programme
contentList: A Faculty Development Programme on Cloud Computing and Security, in association with E&Y, was conducted from 25.08.2025 to 09.09.2025.
A Faculty Development Programme on Cyber Security, in association with E&Y, was conducted from 18.08.2025 to 22.09.2025.
A hands-on training programme on Cyber Security, in association with E&Y, was conducted on 11-12-2025.
